content: Don’t get me started on Apple Photos metadata. I moved to Google Photos because apple insists that each of my devices independently scan photos to identify faces, places and objects. The worst is that I have to do a lot of human editing (merging faces) afterwards, and even that effort is not synced. Also health data. Wtf Apple? There’s no way I can see my health data on my iMac or macbook because it is burried in my iPhone and the health app doesn’t even exist on iPad.
